snippet.title: SILENCIO by eme.guy
snippet.description:
"SILENCIO" is my first 2D game :)

Everything you see is hand-modeled in clay and animated frame by frame using the stop motion technique.

It is an experience of less than a minute that took me several days to complete.

I hope you enjoy it and that it manages to convey something to you.

Achieve silence.🫀
